segments.text: I notice a boy trying to reach a cookie jar on top of a wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so much, it looks like he might fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how unstable that stool looks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate in one hand, probably to catch the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he thinks about the consequences if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out, and it's tilted dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems so focused on getting those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see a girl standing nearby, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks excited and expectant, reaching out her hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they both need to be more careful.
segments.speaker: PAR
